query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

warnings.message: One of the fields on which a sort was requested does not exist

result.title: Webinar to disseminate the toolkit for Civil Society Organisations
result.description: Organisation of three webinars to disseminate the WP4 toolkit (on how to foster alternative narratives on migration) for civil society organisations across Europe. These will be organised by PorCausa.

result.title: Video clip of the rap production
result.description: A videoclip of the rap production that wins the prize will be recorded in collaboration with the artist that has won the mural painting contest. It will be led by CIDOB with the support of the third party Generation Hip Hop or an alternative similar organisation (subcontracted) and the collaboration of PorCausa.

result.title: Cross-national comparative report on the impact of narratives on policymaking at the national level
result.description: On the basis of the 6 national reports (D7.1), UEDIN will write a cross-national comparative report to assess to what extent different contexts lead to different dynamics between narrative production and policymaking.

result.description: These guidelines will aim to ensure the inclusion of the gender perspective in all WPs design tasks and outputs during the whole life of the project It will be led by CIDOB in collaboration with Snia Parella and the European Network of Migrant Women

result.description: Based on the 6 national reports (D3.1), this cross-national comparative report will pinpoint the relevant differences between countries characterised by different media systems. It will be produced by FIERI.

result.title: Short documentary on the photojournalism exhibition
result.description: Short doc (about 10 minutes) that registers the making-of and outcomes of the photojournalism exhibition. It will include a series of video interviews on the working methods, the production and the different phases of photographic editing to contribute to a general reflection on the importance of journalism and documentary photography. It will be produced by ZONA in collaboration with CIDOB, FIERI and PorCausa.

result.title: Policy Brief on the impact of narratives on EU policymaking
result.description: This policy brief will inform policymakers as well as other relevant policy stakeholders on the impact of narratives on institutional rhetoric as well as policies and to foster reflection on the roles and responsibilities of these stakeholders in generating such impact. It will be done by IAI.

result.title: Compilation of two national reports on Gambia and Sudan
result.description: On the basis of focus groups and interviews, two national reports will be produced to analyse the influence of different types of narratives on the attitudes and decisions of (potential) migrants in Gambia and Sudan. It will be led by VUB with the participation of ISF.

result.title: Compilation of 6 national reports on the impact of narratives on policy making at the national level
result.description: 6 national reports will be written to understand how narratives on migration and integration in political debate and policymaking have evolved over the past decade and how these have been received and processed in different policymaking venues in France, Germany, Hungary, Italy, Spain, the UK. It will be led by UEDIN with the participation of CIDOB, FIERI, CUAS, Sciences Po and CSS.

result.title: Report compiling the definition and adaptation of characterisation tests (subtask 4.2.1) and the public data coming from existing or new characterisation tests from subtasks 4.2.2, 4.2.3 and 4.2.4

result.title: Synthesis report of project
result.description: Collate the final outputs from WP2, WP3 and WP4 into an overall synthesis report for a technical readership, and a shorter summary report for a wider readership. The Synthesis report will seek to achieve the following: Ø Act as an entry point for understanding the content and nature of other project deliverables. Ø Enable mutual sharing of experience in the management of specific waste types across EU countries through recognition of common wastes and common challenges. Ø Summarise key strengths and weaknesses of different thermal treatment routes and their appropriateness and feasibility for specific waste streams. Ø Set out understanding of the characteristics and properties of thermally treated wasteforms and their viability for geological disposal, and implications for the safety case. Ø Establish preferred routes and potential mutual sharing of thermal treatment facilities to open management routes and opportunities for waste management across Europe, including identification of uncertainties, further required R&D, and next steps.

result.title: Value Assessment report (Year 3) – based on inputs from WP2, WP3 and WP4
